### 2021 Batting Stats {#batting}
```{r batters, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
d <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/KBO/kbo_stats.rds")
d <- d[d$season == "2021" & d$TeamNameEng == "KT Wiz",]
vars <- c("Name","position","age","batGs","batPa","batHr","batOps","batBBpct","batSOpct","ISO","batBABIP","wRCplus","batWAR")
players <- na.omit(d[c(vars,"playerId")])
players$Name <- paste0("[", players$Name, "](/players/", players$playerId, ")")
players <- players[vars]
players <- players[order(-players[,13]),]
kable(players, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,0,3,1,1,3,3,1,2), row.names = F, col.names = c("Name","Pos","Age","G","PA","HR","OPS","BB%","SO%","ISO","BABIP","wRC+","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = F)
```

### 2021 Pitching Stats {#pitching}
```{r pitchers, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
vars <- c("Name","age","pitGp","pitIp","K9","BB9","HR9","pitBABIP","pitEra","FIP","pitWAR")
players <- na.omit(d[c(vars,"playerId")])
players$Name <- paste0("[", players$Name, "](/players/", players$playerId, ")")
players <- players[vars]
players <- players[order(-players[,11]),]
kable(players, digits = c(0,0,0,1,1,1,1,3,3,2,2), row.names = F, col.names = c("Name","Age","G","IP","K/9","BB/9","HR/9","BABIP","ERA","FIP","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = F)
```
